title: 3a xl wifi call audio
content:
When making or receiving wifi calls the audio drops. The call still shows connected, but I cannot hear the caller and the caller cannot here me, yet the call has not dropped.

I quit wifi and make the call over cellular service and this *always* works.

Now I only make wifi calls using whatsapp or skype. These apps always work over wifi (and cellular).

What's up with that google?
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3a XL
